boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C78E7E.2608963C" Subject: Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.reallydope.com Importance: normal Priority: normal Date: Fri, 4 May 2007 14:58:05 -0400 Message-ID: <9B23754DD4C01445AE3E4F2394B41B3002A4B98A@NEWYORKX.corporate.burberryusa .com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.reallydope.com thread-index: AceOfiZQYvv1U18vTNagP4A+4ckuIw== From: "Legalintern3" To: Cc: "Fabio Silva" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 May 2007 18:58:06.0018 (UTC) FILETIME=[2622B220:01C78E7E] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) May 4, 2007 VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 Email: abuse@theplanet.com Fax: (214) 782-7801 RE: Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.reallydope.com Dear Sir or Madam: I CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Burberry Limited ("IP Owner"), the owner of certain intellectual property rights, specifically federal trademark registrations U.S. Reg. No. 260,843 (issued August 27, 1929) and U.S. Reg. No. 510,077 (issued May 24, 1949) for the BURBERRY word mark, U.S. Reg. No. 1,241,222 (issued June 7, 1983) and U.S. Reg. No. 2,022,789 (issued December 17, 1996) for the BURBERRY CHECK trademark, and U.S. Reg. No. 863,179 (issued January 7, 1969) for the EQUESTRIAN KNIGHT DEVICE. I have a good faith belief that the materials found through the link below are not authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. It is my understanding that your company, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. ("ThePlanet.com") provides web hosting services to the above-referenced web site through its subsidiary, www.ev1servers.net. Therefore, I am requesting that ThePlanet.com, pursuant to its Acceptable Use Policy's ("AUP") shut down the web site for offering for sale counterfeit goods. In particular, I refer to those parts of the AUP that read: Intellectual Property Infringement Policy Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret right of any other person. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998... * * * If any Customer or any Third Party User, including those that are customers of our Customers, repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy, any copyright law or any other intellectual property right, The Planet reserves the right to (i) suspend permanently or terminate The Planet Services of such Customer and/or (ii) suspend permanently or terminate the access to The Planet Services, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure by such Third Party User. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the following materials or items claimed to be infringing. http://www.reallydope.com/show.asp?sel=timb http://www.reallydope.com/info.asp?item=tm14 http://www.reallydope.com/info.asp?item=tm13 http://www.reallydope.com/info.asp?item=tm12 http://www.reallydope.com/info.asp?item=tm11 http://www.reallydope.com/info.asp?item=tm10 Please contact me if you have any questions. Sincerely, Fabio R. Silva Intellectual Property Counsel Burberry Limited 1350 Avenue of the Americas New York, NY 10019 T (212) 707-6545 F (212) 246-2486 fsilva@burberryusa.com FS/st Shamik Trivedi Legal Intern Intellectual Property Department BURBERRY Ltd. 1350 Avenue of the Americas New York, NY 10019 This message, including any attachment(s) is confidential information and is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s). Unauthorized interception, review, use, disclosure or distribution of any information contained within this message and/or its attachment(s), is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender by replying to this mail message and delete all copies of the original message and any attachments. MIME element (text/html)

May 4, 2007

 

VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

Email:  abuse@theplanet.com

Fax: (214) 782-7801

 

          &nbs p; RE:  Counterfeit Burberry Merchandise on www.reallydope.com< /span>

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

         ;    I CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Burberry Limited (“IP Owner”), the owner of certain intellectual property rights, specifically federal trademark registrations U.S. Reg. No. 260,843 (issued August 27, 1929) and U.S. Reg. No. 510,077 (issued May 24, 1949) for the BURBERRY word mark, U.S. Reg. No. 1,241,222 (issued June 7, 1983) and U.S. Reg. No. 2,022,789 (issued December 17, 1996) for the BURBERRY CHECK trademark, and U.S. Reg. No. 863,179 (issued January 7, 1969) for the EQUESTRIAN KNIGHT DEVICE. 

 

I have a good faith belief that the materials found through the link below are not authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. 

 

It is my understanding that your company, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (“ThePlanet.com”) provides web hosting services to the above-referenced web site through its subsidiary, www.ev1servers. net.  Therefore, I am requesting that ThePlanet.com, pursuant to its Acceptable Use Policy’s (“AUP”) shut down the web site for offering for sale counterfeit goods. 

 

          &nbs p; In particular, I refer to those parts of the AUP that read:

 

Intellectual Property Infringement Policy

 

Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret right of any other person. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998…

 

         ;             ;             ;    *          *          *

 

If any Customer or any Third Party User, including those that are customers of our Customers, repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy, any copyright law or any other intellectual property right, The Planet reserves the right to (i) suspend permanently or terminate The Planet Services of such Customer and/or (ii) suspend permanently or terminate the access to The Planet Services, The Planet Network or its physical infrastructure by such Third Party User.

 

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the following materials or items claimed to be infringing.

http://www.reallydope .com/show.asp?sel=timb

http://www.reallydop e.com/info.asp?item=tm14

http://www.reallydop e.com/info.asp?item=tm13

http://www.reallydop e.com/info.asp?item=tm12

http://www.reallydop e.com/info.asp?item=tm11

http://www.reallydop e.com/info.asp?item=tm10

 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

 

Sincerely,

 

 

 

 

Fabio R. Silva

Intellectual Property Counsel

Burberry Limited

1350 Avenue of the Americas

New York, NY  10019

T (212) 707-6545

F (212) 246-2486

fsilva@burberryusa.com

 

FS/st

 

 

Shamik Trivedi
